Asset.name: Model Name
Asset.desc: The model used by this part; requires an entry in ModelParam.

Asset.name: Instance ID
Asset.desc: Involved with serialization.

Asset.name: Layout Path
Asset.desc: A path to a .sib file, presumably some kind of editor placeholder.

Asset.name: Position
Asset.desc: The position of this part.

Asset.name: Rotation
Asset.desc: The rotation of this part.

Asset.name: Scale
Asset.desc: The scale of this part. Scale will NOT affect the scale of enemies or the scale of in-built collision for objects and assets (except for assets in Elden Ring).

Asset.name: Game Edition Disable Type
Asset.desc: Toggles the loading of this part.

Asset.name: Map Studio Layer
Asset.desc: Unknown.

Asset.name: Entity ID
Asset.desc: Identifies the part in event scripts.

Asset.name: Uses Parts Draw Param ID
Asset.desc: Enables use of PartsDrawParamID. If false, asset param is used instead.

Asset.name: Parts Draw Param ID
Asset.desc: The Parts Draw Param ID to use.

Asset.name: Is Point Light Shadow Source
Asset.desc: Is this part to be considered a Point Light shadow source.

Asset.name: UnkE0B
Asset.desc: Unknown

Asset.name: Is Shadow Source
Asset.desc: Is this part to be considered a shadow source.

Asset.name: Is Static Shadow Source
Asset.desc: Is this part to be considered a static shadow source.

Asset.name: Is Cascade Shadow Source
Asset.desc: Is this part to be considered a cascade shadow source.

Asset.name: Is Shadow Destination
Asset.desc: Is this part to be considered a shadow destination.

Asset.name: Is Shadow Only
Asset.desc: Is this part only rendered when calculating the shadow pass.

Asset.name: Is Drawn by Reflection Camera
Asset.desc: Is this part drawn by the reflection camera.

Asset.name: Is Drawn Only by the Reflection Camera
Asset.desc: Is this part only drawn within the reflection camera.

Asset.name: Entity Group ID
Asset.desc: A entity group ID associated with this part. Allows multiple parts to be identified with a single entity ID.

Asset.name: Display Group
Asset.desc: A display group for this part.

Asset.name: Draw Group
Asset.desc: A draw group for this part.

Asset.name: Collision Mask
Asset.desc: A collision mask for this part.

Asset.name: Display Group
Asset.desc: A display group for this part.

Asset.name: Light Set ID
Asset.desc: ID of the value set from LightSet ParamEditor to use.

Asset.name: Fog Param ID
Asset.desc: ID of the value set from FogParamEditor to use.

Asset.name: Light Scattering ID
Asset.desc: ID of the value set from LightScattering : ParamEditor to use.

Asset.name: Ennvironment Map ID
Asset.desc: ID of the value set from Env Map:Editor to use.

Asset.name: Transition Time
Asset.desc: Transition time between scenes.

Asset.name: Graphics Param Override: [1]
Asset.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override use.

Asset.name: Graphics Param Override: [2]
Asset.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1] with.

Asset.name: Graphics Param Override: [3]
Asset.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1] and [2] with.

Asset.name: Graphics Param Override: [4]
Asset.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1], [2] and [3] with.
